places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Aditya Residency and Aditya Banquet Hall
address: near Tehsil office, behind Jadhav hospital, Lecturers Colony, Bhalki, Karnataka 585328, India

reviews.text:
Been there over the weekend, quaint place, good and clean rooms. This looks like a fairly new establishment. Very courteous staff. I checked in quite late (around 3AM) and the reception responded at the first ring. Friendly staff, affordable room rates. Overall quite a pleasant stay.
One note: the parking space is a little less so please have a word with the management and they will help you park the vehicle.
Stayed for a night at this hotel and the experience was really awesome.
This hotel is very nice and the cleaning is also very good and the staff here is very friendly, you must also visit once.

Great location.really pleasant and clean rooms.
I had a great experience during my stay there.
Good ambience.. .spacious rooms.. .. Co-operative staff.. Well cleaned... Highly recommended.. .

places_with_reviews.name: SPOT ON 61562 Hotel Sai Boarding And Lodging
address: nilanga road, near essar petrol pump, Bhalki, Karnataka 585328, India

reviews.text:
Very Bad hotel and their staff ...it was very bad experience in my life...no cleaned rooms, bathroom is very bad like bus stand common bathrooms.

Don't anyone in this hotel
Very bad hotel never stay here, no hot water, bedsheet, water leak in room, no light in bathroom.and in the room only one light.

Dont  go  this  place.I paid the full amount through oyo online and they demanded for more money.I was with my wife and it was 9pm.They were like ..if u want to stay give money stay otherwise u can go. Cheaters !!!
Not much clean. Electric points were not working. Hot water was not available.

Good quality
Clean maintaince
Best rooms in bhalki
